Description:
load malicious registered COM objects

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Rundll32 Registered COM Objects
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((command like '%-sta %' or command like '%-localserver %') and (command like '%{%' and command like '%}%')) and (process_path like '%\rundll32.exe' and original_file_name = 'rundll32.exe'))
